CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 3 Recently , significant progress has been made in the photovoltaic application of novel low - bandgap polymers with optical absorption wavelengths in the range of 700-900 nm.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| low - bandgap polymers |
| 700-900 nm |

The two Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. low - bandgap polymers
2. 700-900 nm (which refers to the range of optical absorption wavelengths)

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid Material Name entities:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| low - bandgap polymers |

The entity "700-900 nm" does not clearly refer to a material name, as it represents a range of wavelengths rather than a specific material. Therefore, the only valid Material Name entity in the paragraph is "low - bandgap polymers".
